subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The A.C.C. suspended the Florida State women’s coach Mark Krikorian for one game and fined the university $25,000 for not taking several starters to the league tournament.
snippet: The A.C.C. suspended the Florida State women’s coach Mark Krikorian for one game and fined the university $25,000 for not taking several starters to the league tournament.
